'''Nurseries''', also called '''Nurseries in the Wilds''',<ref name="map">Official Interactive Map: [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html Teyvat]</ref> are an exploration mechanic in [[Sumeru]]. They are part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Viparyas of Vanarana]]''.

Players must following glowing spirits floating over the nursery and traverse each field without backtracking to obtain a [[Vasmrti]] and a Common Chest. There are 12 nurseries in total, and the route for each field is randomized.

There is a [[Vanarana Nursery|special nursery]] cared for by [[Aranakula]] in [[Vanarana (Subarea)|Vanarana]], which is also part of ''The Viparyas of Vanarana''.

==Locations==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=396 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
